CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 6, 1965, pg. 22 reads: "Team Of Distinction - Here are the five starting players on the sensational, unbeaten Uniontown High School basketball team. This picture of the Raiders was taken Monday night after they had won their 52nd game in a row, a 75-40 decision over Hempfield. Thursday night, Uniontown meets Aliquippa at the Civic Arena.  Left to right: Charles Beckwith, Ray Stephens, Ray Parson, Wilford Minor, Pat Yates and Coach Abe Everhart. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Uniontown High School basketball players, from left: Charles Beckwith, Ray Stephens, Ray Parson, Wilford Minor, and Pat Yates, with Coach Abe Everhart, posed in locker room after win over Hempfield
